Yep thats what=A0I saw too thats why I said I'd have to question more becau=
se what the trooper told me doesnt quite make sense to me compared to what =
I found online. Maybe Aprils right I dont know until I ask. Maybe just a ni=
ce way of asking over the airwaves.
=A0
Out of service =3D dead perhaps wit=
hout spreading false alarm to anyone whos listening. I have no clue. Will l=
et ya know later why he said that. 
=A0
Misty

odes for fatalities, accidents, and trauma.
Code 7 means things like home, =
on personal time, in court, etc.

tml

Code 7 is either code for being out of service (short for =

--- On Sun, 5/10/09, Misty Daw=
n <bulletbabea@ yahoo.com> wrote:


From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@ yahoo.co=
m>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] The Seven - interesting tidbit of info
To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups .com
Date: Sunday, May 10, 2009, 9:31 PM









Tonight at work=
 I was talking to a state trooper, there had been an accident. I asked him =
if there were any deaths (it was very very bad) and he said he didnt know s=
o he got on his radio and called in and asked them if it was a 7 at the sit=
e. They told him negative, and he told me the little boy who was the worst =
off was still alive. I asked him why did you ask them if it was a 7. He sai=
d code 7, I was asking them if they were dead. So if you ever hear anyone c=
all 7 over the radio that means someones dead.
=A0
Just thought I would pas=
s that on. I find it interesting since I know alot of us have heard this be=
fore when used to describe who is speaking rather than a name they say seve=
n.
=A0
Misty

<DIV>Tonight at work I was talking to a state trooper, there had been an=
 accident. I asked him if there were any deaths (it was very very bad) and =
he said he didnt know so he got on his radio and called in and asked them i=
f it was a 7 at the site. They told him negative, and he told me the little=
 boy who was the worst off was still alive. I asked him why did you ask the=
m if it was a 7. He said code 7, I was asking them if they were dead. So if=
 you ever hear anyone call 7 over the radio that means someones dead.</DIV>=

<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Just thought I would pass that on. I find it intere=
